subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Brittney Griner , the 6-foot-8 Baylor center, is expected to be the top pick in Monday’s W.N.B.A. draft. Will she become as transformative off the court as she has been on the court?
snippet: Brittney Griner , the 6-foot-8 Baylor center, is expected to be the top pick in Monday’s W.N.B.A. draft. Will she become as transformative off the court as she has been on the court?
